settings.content: We suggest reading through our [documentation](http://www.pixelunion.net/support/pacific-theme-manual/), which provides a thorough overview of all the theme's features. It also includes helpful instructions and design tips from the team. If you're confused at any stage, don't hesitate to contact us by sending a quick [email](mailto:support@pixelunion.net) or [tweet](http://twitter.com/pixelunion). We're available Monday through Friday during our office hours, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (PST).
Find us on the web: [Pixel Union](http://www.pixelunion.net) | Twitter: [@pixelunion](http://twitter.com/pixelunion) | Facebook: [http://facebook.com/pixelunion](http://facebook.com/pixelunion)

settings.label: Navigation name
settings.info: This will replace "mega nav" in your menu.

settings.label: Enable sidebar
settings.info: The "all" option denotes the Home page, Collections List page, and Collection pages.

settings.content: Select up to three modules to show in your footer.
Choose your home page sections and their order.
Each section can only be used once on the home page.

settings.label: Choose width
settings.info: If the sidebar is enabled this will revert to content width.

settings.info: Only appears when "text shade" is set to "light".

settings.label: Choose collection
settings.info: Products will be pulled from this collection.

settings.label: Choose page
settings.info: Content will be imported from this page.

settings.label: Choose blog
settings.info: Posts will be pulled from this blog.

settings.label: Disable sold out variants
settings.info: Disables sold out/unavailable variants in the product variant selectors so that they are no longer clickable.

settings.label: Enable cart redirection
settings.info: Automatically send users to the Cart page after adding a product.

settings.label: Enable product image flip on hover

settings.content: Create up to three menus to filter your collections by (e.g., 'Colour', 'Size' and 'Material'). Leave all three set to 'None' if you want to have a single dropdown that lists all of the collection's tags.

settings.label: Show when stock is lower than:
Default country
settings.info: If a customer is logged in, their default shipping address country will be selected.

settings.content: Whether you choose to use MailChimp or Campaign Monitor, both services will provide you with a Form "Action" URL linking to your account. Check out our theme [documentation](http://www.pixelunion.net/support/pacific-theme-manual/#newsletter) for setting up a MailChimp or Campaign Monitor account.

settings.label: Tag
settings.info: Enter the tag without the hashmark. Example: selfie.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
By selecting the Hide Decimal Digits checkbox, the prices will be diplayed without decimal digits.

settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.label: Currencies you wish to support

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
